put.mlc.classifiers.common

Class TunedClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • put.mlc.classifiers.common.TunedClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class TunedClassifier
extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
    Implementation of a classifier that tunes parameters. It chooses the best of given classifiers with regard to logistic loss.
    The decision is made via internal cross validation.
    Author:
    Adrian Jaroszewicz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
